name: EnvelopeWorkflowScheduledSending_PutEnvelopeScheduledSendingDefinition
description: Updates the scheduled sending rules for an envelope's workflow. The envelope must have an existing workflow object.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

body.description: An object that describes the settings for scheduled sending.

$block: A complex element that specifies the scheduled sending settings for the envelope.

$ul: **bulkListId**: The ID of the bulk list. Set this optional value to use scheduled sending with a bulk send operation.
**resumeDate**: The timestamp of when the envelope is scheduled to be sent in ISO 8601 format.
**rules**: User-specified rules indicating how and when the envelope should be scheduled for sending. Only one rule may be specified.
**status**: Status of the scheduled sending job. Valid values:

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
